languages.text: "В том бою, в котором тебя, Пропащий, Арнульфа и Скьядди пленили ксеносы, Голодные взяли пленников. Под пыткой они выдали звездные координаты, куда должны были направиться после для некой важной встречи. Это было... далеко. В глубинах неразведанных областей, куда не добирались слуги Всеотца. И твои братья решили направиться туда. Ни один навигатор не осмелился вести их в сии мрачные места, и тогда они силой взяли торговую ладью и отправились туда без лоцмана".

"In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Baleful Howl took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."
languages.original_text: "В том бою, в котором тебя, Пропащий, Арнульфа и Скьядди пленили ксеносы, Голодные взяли пленников. Под пыткой они выдали звездные координаты, куда должны были направиться после для некой важной встречи. Это было... далеко. В глубинах неразведанных областей, куда не добирались слуги Всеотца. И твои братья решили направиться туда. Ни один навигатор не осмелился вести их в сии мрачные места, и тогда они силой взяли торговую ладью и отправились туда без лоцмана".

traits.locale_text: "In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Famehungry took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

"In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Famehungry took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

"In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Famehungry took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

"In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Baleful Howl took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

languages.text: “在那场战斗中，阿努尔夫、斯卡蒂，还有你，迷途之人，沦为了异形的俘虏，但怒嚎者也同样俘虏了一部分异形。严刑逼问之下，那些异形交代了他们目的地的坐标。他们好像是要去那个地方，参加什么重要的会议。那个地方……很远，位于全父的仆人从未涉足的地方。你的兄弟们打算硬冲过去，但根本没有哪位导航者敢带他们去如此黑暗的地方。于是，你的兄弟们就抢走了一艘商船，在没有导航者的情况下，朝那边开过去了。”
languages.original_text: "In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Baleful Howl took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

traits.locale_text: “在那场战斗中，阿努尔夫、斯卡蒂，还有你，迷途之人，沦为了异形的俘虏，但渴名者也同样俘虏了一部分异形。严刑逼问之下，那些异形交代了他们目的地的坐标。他们好像是要去那个地方，参加什么重要的会议。那个地方……很远，位于全父的仆人从未涉足的地方。你的兄弟们打算硬冲过去，但根本没有哪位导航者敢带他们去如此黑暗的地方。于是，你的兄弟们就抢走了一艘商船，在没有导航者的情况下，朝那边开过去了。”

languages.text: 「お前らとエバーロスト、アーノルフ、それとスキアディが異種族に捕まった戦闘で、破滅の咆哮は異種族どもを捕虜にとった。拷問にかけると、捕えた異種族どもは次に向かう星の座標を白状した…そこで重要な会合があるらしい。その場所は…かなりの遠方だ。地図に記されてない宙域の奥深く、全知の父の従者も進んだことのない場所にある。エバーロストの同胞はそこへ向かうことにしたんだ。そんな暗たんたる場所に連れてってくれる航宙士なんざ、いるはずもないからな、小型の貿易船を手に入れて操舵手なしで航海に出たよ」
languages.original_text: "In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Baleful Howl took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

traits.locale_text: 「お前らとエバーロスト、アーノルフ、それとスキアディが異種族に捕まった戦闘で、誉れある飢えは異種族どもを捕虜にとった。拷問にかけると、捕えた異種族どもは次に向かう星の座標を白状した――そこで重要な会合があるらしい。その場所は…かなりの遠方だ。地図に記されてない宙域の奥深く、全知の父の従者も進んだことのない場所にある。エバーロストの同胞はそこへ向かうことにしたんだ。そんな暗たんたる場所に連れてってくれる航宙士なんざ、いるはずもないからな、小型の貿易船を手に入れて操舵手なしで航海に出たよ」

languages.text: «En la batalla en que los xenos capturaron al Perdido, a Arnoolf, y a Skyaddi, el Aullido Torvo también tomó sus propios prisioneros. Tras torturarlos, los xenos cautivos dieron las coordenadas estelares de su próximo destino: un cónclave importante, al parecer. Aquel sitio estaba... lejísimos, en las profundidades de las regiones inexploradas a las que los siervos del Padre de todas las cosas no han ido aún. Pero sí tus hermanos. Ningún navegante en su sano juicio los llevaría a aquellos lares siniestros, así que tus hermanos se agenciaron una nave mercante y se lanzaron a la aventura sin maestro timonel ni nada».
languages.original_text: "In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Baleful Howl took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

traits.locale_text: «En la batalla en que los xenos capturaron al Perdido, Arnoolf, Skyaddi y usted, los Hambrientos de Fama se hicieron con sus propios prisioneros. Tras torturarlos, los xenos cautivos dieron las coordenadas estelares de su próximo destino: un cónclave importante, al parecer. Aquel sitio estaba... lejísimos, en las profundidades de las regiones inexploradas a las que los siervos del Padre de todas las cosas no se han atrevido a ir. Pero sí tus hermanos. Ningún navegante en su sano juicio los llevaría a aquellos lares siniestros, así que tus hermanos se agenciaron una nave mercante y se lanzaron a la aventura sin maestro timonel ni nada».

languages.text: « Les Hurleurs sanguinaires ont eux aussi fait des prisonniers lors de la bataille où l'Égaré, Arnoolf, Skyaddi et vous-même avez été capturés par les xénos. Sous la torture, les captifs nous ont révélé les coordonnées stellaires de leur prochaine destination où doit se tenir une importante rencontre. Cet endroit est... très loin, au cœur des régions inexplorées où les serviteurs du Père de Tous ne se sont jamais aventurés. Et tes frères ont décidé de s'y rendre. Aucun navigateur n'aurait osé les guider dans ces ténèbres, alors ils ont arraisonné un vaisseau marchand et entrepris ce voyage sans timonier. »
languages.original_text: "In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Baleful Howl took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

traits.locale_text: « Les Dévoreurs de gloire ont eux aussi fait des prisonniers lors de la bataille où l'Égaré, Arnoolf, Skyaddi et vous-même avez été capturés par les xénos. Sous la torture, les captifs nous ont révélé les coordonnées stellaires de leur prochaine destination où doit se tenir une importante rencontre. Cet endroit est... très loin, au cœur des régions inexplorées où les serviteurs du Père de Tous ne se sont jamais aventurés. Et tes frères ont décidé de s'y rendre. Aucun navigateur n'aurait osé les guider dans ces ténèbres, alors ils ont arraisonné un vaisseau marchand et entrepris ce voyage sans timonier. »

languages.text: "In den Kampf, den Ihr verloren habt, Siegtnie, wurden Arnoolf und Skyaddi von den Xenos gefangen genommen. Auch die Baleful Howl haben eigene Gefangene gemacht. Unter Folter haben die gefangenen Xenos die Sternenkoordinaten ihres nächsten Ziels preisgegeben. Offenbar waren sie zu einem wichtigen Treffen unterwegs. Ihr Ziel lag ... sehr weit entfernt. Tief in den unerforschten Regionen, in die sich die Diener des Allvaters noch nie vorgewagt haben. Und Eure Brüder haben entschieden, dort hinzureisen. Kein Navigator wagte es, sie an solch dunkle Orte zu führen, daher haben Eure Brüder ein Handelsschiff gekapert und sich ohne Steuermann auf den Weg gemacht."
languages.original_text: "In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Baleful Howl took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

traits.locale_text: "Bei der Schlacht, in der Ihr, Siegtnie, Arnoolf und Skyaddi von den Xenos ergriffen wurdet, haben die Famehungry auch selbst Gefangene gemacht. Unter Folter gaben diese Xenos die Sternenkoordinaten ihres nächsten Ziels preis – anscheinend irgendein wichtiges Zusammentreffen. Der Ort war ... weit entfernt. Tief in den unkartografierten Regionen, wohin die Diener des Allvaters niemals vorgedrungen sind. Und Eure Brüder beschlossen, dorthin zu gehen. Kein Navigator wagte es, sie zu diesen dunklen Orten zu führen, also kaperten Eure Brüder ein Handelsschiff und flogen ohne Steuermann los."

languages.text: "Sen Hepgaip, Arnoolf ve Skyaddi'nin zenolar tarafından esir alındığınız savaşta Uğursuz Uluma kendi mahkûmlarını aldı. Tutsak zenolar işkence sonucunda daha sonra gidecekleri önemli bir toplantının yıldız koordinatlarını verdi. Bu yer... Çok uzaktı. Yücebaba'nın hizmetkârlarının hiç adım atmadığı, keşfedilmemiş bölgelerin derinliklerindeydi. Kardeşlerin oraya gitmeye karar verdi. Hiçbir Rotacı, onları o karanlık yerlere götürmeye cesaret edemezdi, bu yüzden kardeşlerin bir ticaret gemisini ele geçirip serdümenleri olmadan yola koyuldu."
languages.original_text: "In the battle in which you, Everlost, Arnoolf, and Skyaddi were captured by the xenos, the Baleful Howl took prisoners of their own. Under torture, the captive xenos gave up the star coordinates of where they were to go next — some important meeting, it seems. The place was... far away. Deep in the uncharted regions where the servants of the Allfather have never ventured. And your brothers decided to go there. No Navigator would dare lead them to those dark places, so your brothers seized a trading boat and voyaged there without a helmsman."

traits.locale_text: "Sen Hepgaip, Arnoolf ve Skyaddi'nin zenolar tarafından esir alındığınız savaşta Uğursuz Uluma kendi mahkûmlarını aldı. Tutsak zenolar işkence sonucunda daha sonra gidecekleri önemli bir toplantının yıldız koordinatlarını verdi. Bu yer... Çok uzaktı. Yücebaba'nın hizmetkârlarının hiç adım atmadığı, keşfedilmemiş bölgelerin derinliklerindeydi. Kardeşlerin oraya gitmeye karar verdi. Hiçbir Rotacı, onları o karanlık yerlere götürmeye cesaret edemezdi, bu yüzden kardeşlerin bir ticaret gemisini ele geçirip serdümenleri olmadan yola koyuldu."
